game.description: The kingdom is under attack and you have been chosen to save it. Gather your allies, strengthen your powers and defeat the evil forces.
game.objective: Save the kingdom from the attack of evil forces.

tasks.description: Gather an army by convincing the chiefs of the five tribes. You need to win their trials first to gain their trust.
tasks.objective: Win the five trials and convince the tribe chiefs.

tasks.description: Discover the ancient powers hidden beneath the Sacred Mountain. It's a dangerous journey filled with deadly traps and creatures.
tasks.objective: Retrieve the ancient power from the mountain top.

tasks.description: Use the gathered army and the discovered powers to defeat the evil forces attacking the kingdom.

game.title: The Kingdom's Call
